function.name: randomFloat
function.description: Returns a random float value between 0.0 (inclusiver) and 1.0 (exclusive).

function.name: randomInt
function.arg: Exclusive upper bound if this is the only argument provided. Inclusive lower bound if two arguments are provided.
Exclusive upper bound if both arguments are provided.
function.description: Returns a random integer in the given range. Accepts either 1 or 2 arguments. For 1 argument, this produces a random number between 0 (inclusive) and the argument (exclusive). For 2 arguments, this produces a random number between the first argument (inclusive) and the second argument (exclusive).
